channel.title: Hamachi or no-ip?
channel.description: well since we are not allowed to say wether our server is no-ip or hamachi now, it gets frusturating having to go on all the wrong topics, just to find out they are hamachi which i have no clue how to use. we should be able to put something in it to indicate wether its hamachi or no-ip, maybe [ham] or [no-ip] now how in the world is that spam? wow its indicating wther its no-ip or ham its such spam because it lets ppl know what kind of server it is -_-... :eek:i dunno about anyone else or any of mods, but we should be able to know before we click, tecniquially its spam to have to go to topics you dont want =\

item.title: Hamachi or no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @shamcooly shamcooly
item.description:
@shamcooly wrote:

well maybe we should be able to have kind of sumbols for hamachi and no ip?
= hamachi?
= no-ip? i mean we should have some sort of way to do this…

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi or no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @Sole Sole
item.description:
@Sole wrote:

although i fully agree with shamcooly, teh mods decided it was “spam” and “looked not neat”

really its just “annoying” and “confusing” and “makes you feel stupid when you click on a ham post, and you dont have ham so you have to sift threads to find one”

But you gotta listen to teh mods -.-

Read full topic

this is spam and having no tags makes the advertisement look much nicer
